version_description: Crash fixes.
Crash fixes.

New features and improvements:
• Testing 1, 2, 3. You should definitely be able to hear us now with our updated Audio Interface.
• Get those steps in! Walking directions are now easier to access and so is that pizza place a few blocks away. Everyone knows calories don't count if you walked there.
• General bug fixes and user experience improvements.

New features and improvements:
• Testing 1, 2, 3. You should definitely be able to hear us now with our updated Audio Interface.
• Get those steps in! Walking directions are now easier to access and so is that pizza place a few blocks away. Everyone knows calories don't count if you walked there.
• General bug fixes and user experience improvements.

The updated MapQuest is like a Swiss Army Knife. Simple, yet incredibly useful. A cut above the rest, so to speak.

New Features and Improvements
• New look and feel for account creation and arrival views
• Easier 1Password login integration
• Helpful parking spot reminder tool
• We squashed a few bugs, too

The updated MapQuest is like a Swiss Army Knife. Simple, yet incredibly useful. A cut above the rest, so to speak.

• We squashed a few bugs, too

The updated MapQuest is like a Swiss Army Knife. Simple, yet incredibly useful. A cut above the rest, so to speak.

New Features and Improvements
• New look and feel for account creation and arrival views
• Easier 1Password login integration
• Helpful parking spot reminder tool
• We squashed a few bugs, too

Features and Updates
• Hate driving in circles for parking spots? So do we. MapQuesters in Washington DC, Kansas City, and Palo Alto can check out our real time information (and save yourself the gray hairs). More cities and streets to come.
• We fixed some bugs, because no one likes bugs…unless you’re an Entomologist.

Features and Updates
• Hate driving in circles for parking spots? So do we. MapQuesters in Washington DC, Kansas City, and Palo Alto can check out our real time information (and save yourself the gray hairs). More cities and streets to come.
• We fixed some bugs, because no one likes bugs…unless you’re an Entomologist.

Features and Updates
• We crushed more bugs so hopefully you don't have to deal with it

Features and Updates
• We crushed more bugs so hopefully you don't have to deal with it

New Features and Updates:
• Updated design for the curves (iPhone X) that go on for miles.
• Backend improvements for better and smoother experiences.
• Bug fixes:
• We fixed the hiccup with our traffic congestion reroutes. Now, we'll honor your choice to either cancel or accept the reroute.
• We cleaned up the ghost pins that may have showed up on your map when activating layers or searching for businesses.
• We addressed the 3D touch crash that was happening on iOS 11.

New Features and Updates:
• Updated design for the curves (iPhone X) that go on for miles.
• Backend improvements for better and smoother experiences.
• Bug fixes:
• We fixed the hiccup with our traffic congestion reroutes. Now, we'll honor your choice to either cancel or accept the reroute.
• We cleaned up the ghost pins that may have showed up on your map when activating layers or searching for businesses.
• We addressed the 3D touch crash that was happening on iOS 11.

Features and Updates:
• You can now set your destination as favorite upon arrival
• Bug and crash fixes

Product updates and fixes:
• Points of interests are now displayed on the map.
• Bug fixes.

Details:
2017 has been a busy year, and we want to end with a bang! In this release, you'll notice a completely enhanced mapping experience:
• We brought our map to life by displaying points of interest. You can now discover nearby places by zooming and panning on the map.
• And you can't forget the bugs -- we've fixed those too.

Let us know what you think of our new look! Email us at help@mapquest.com

• Bug fixes.

Details:
2017 has been a busy year, and we want to end with a bang! In this release, you'll notice a completely enhanced mapping experience:
• We brought our map to life by displaying points of interest. You can now discover nearby places by zooming and panning on the map.
• And you can't forget the bugs -- we've fixed those too.

Let us know what you think of our new look! Email us at help@mapquest.com

We squashed more bugs to provide you a better mapping experience.

Product updates:

• Bug fixes

Thanks for using MapQuest! In this release, we've made improvements behind-the-curtain to help ensure we're providing the smoothest navigation, GPS and mapping experience.

Now, you can continue to be the route planner your friends and family need you to be. Go on and discover new places nearby, and beat rush hour with live traffic updates!

Love our app? Please rate us!
Have a question? Visit us at help.mapquest.com

Features and Updates:
• Bug fixes

Features and Updates:
• Bug fixes

We update the app as often as possible to make it better and more reliable. This release:
• We fixed the external links sent from MapQuest.com to load properly in our app.
• And we fixed issue where in some cases route ribbon not being drawn properly

We update the app as often as possible to make it better and more reliable. This release:
• We fixed the external links sent from MapQuest.com to load properly in our app.
• And we fixed issue where in some cases route ribbon not being drawn properly

Product updates:
• New map style
• New route line color
• New category icons

Spring into adventure and warmer weather with our good-lookin' map update.

In this release, you’ll notice a completely enhanced mapping experience:
• Colors to highlight real-world features.
• Boosted contrast for clearer road distinctions.
• New font for improved legibility.
• Stylized route lines to look even better than before.
• And categorized map icons to reflect its business type for easier discoverability.

Let us know what you think! Email us at help@mapquest.com.

For the latest and greatest, please make sure you are on iOS 10 or higher.

In this release, we’ve given you a brand new and improved route ribbon!

We’ve also updated the slow traffic color from a dim yellow to a nice bright yellow.

And, we fixed how your round trip route ribbon is styled. If you take a roundtrip which follows the same route there and back, you will now see what has been driven (gray ribbon) vs where you need to drive (blue ribbon) displaying properly.

In this release, we’ve given you a brand new and improved route ribbon!

We’ve also updated the slow traffic color from a dim yellow to a nice bright yellow.

And, we fixed how your round trip route ribbon is styled. If you take a roundtrip which follows the same route there and back, you will now see what has been driven (gray ribbon) vs where you need to drive (blue ribbon) displaying properly.

Product updates:
• Behind-the-curtain improvements
• Bug fixes

Thanks for using MapQuest! We regularly update our app to help ensure we’re providing the smoothest navigation, GPS and mapping experience.

In this release, we’ve squashed those medley bugs you might have been experiencing, as well as completed behind-the-curtain improvements. Now, continue to be the route planner your friends and family need you to be, go on and discover new places nearby, and beat rush hour with live traffic updates!

Love our app? Please rate us!
Have a question? Visit us at help.mapquest.com

• Bug fixes

Thanks for using MapQuest! In this release, we've made improvements behind-the-curtain to help ensure we're providing the smoothest navigation, GPS and mapping experience.

We’ve also squashed some bugs, which should help improve your battery life. So, now you’ll have even more time to explore the map, discovery new places and get directions!

Product updates:
• Spanish language support
• Navigation improvements
• Bug fixes

Hey, you! Thanks for using MapQuest! To ensure we're providing you with the best directions, GPS and mapping experience, we improve and update our app regularly.

In this release, we officially pushed out support for Spanish directions! If you’d like to give it a try, please change your iOS default language, in your phone’s settings, to “Español.”

We also fixed the bug that was preventing you from opening shared directions from MapQuest.com, and fixed the broken Roadside Assistance link.

Love our app? Please rate us!
Wanna talk? Visit us at help.mapquest.com

- A temporary solution for users unable to log in to their accounts.
We know. Login is not working and it's causing some of you a lot of inconvenience. We're very sorry about that. We had to make some changes to our login system that are causing this bug. Rest assured, all of your data is still there, and login will be fixed ASAP. We promise!
For now, you can send your routes directly from your desktop to your phone. Just click the ‘Share’ button on the route and text or email the link to your phone. When the link opens, choose "Use MapQuest's app for voice navigation".
Having any trouble? Check out https://help.mapquest.com or email us at help@mapquest.com.

- Login is fixed! You can now sign in to your MapQuest account again.
It's about time, right? Thanks for your patience, and apologies for the inconvenience while you waited for the fix.
Once you log in, you can find all your saved My Maps, just click on “Favorites” at the bottom of the screen.
Still having problems? Email us at help@mapquest.com.
Don’t have an account? Now is a great time to try one out. Save POIs and routes while at your desktop, then access them any time from your phone. Visit mapquest.com in your browser to sign up and create your first My Map.
Love our app? Please rate us!
Have a question? Drop us a line, or visit us at help.mapquest.com
